1.content: Fix TypeScript compilation errors in UGT Towa portal
1.details:
1. Fix type mismatch in usePWA.ts line 78: Event vs BeforeInstallPromptEvent
2. Fix undefined 'user' variable in AdminCitas.tsx line 1321
3. Import and use useAuth hook to get current user data
4. Test the fixes by running build locally
5. Deploy updated code to resolve Vercel build failure
